reviewText:
STOP!!!!!!
Don't buy this game.
Think why is no other reviews? Simply because you have to play at least 5 minutes to write one.
But this game doesn't start. To write this review i tried started this game hundreds of times and now I writing my warning

DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.

Lack of information on support webside. Wasted money.

reviewText: The biggest drawback is that there's no controller support. If you have a Pinnacle Profiler license, this is the perfect game to use it on. Took about 10 minutes to set up a profile that works great with the game and my daughter loved it.
